findings.title: Deployer cannot mint any new tokens
findings.description: Owner can set Minter and Minter can mint, but Deployer cannot mint any new tokens

findings.title: Owner can set Minter
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to set a minter, which could lead to unauthorized token creation.

findings.title: Minter can mint
findings.description: Owner can set Minter and Minter has permission to mint tokens
